quest_desc.qdesc: 칼라엔은 돈히코테가 잃어버린 시간의 폐허에 나타났다면서 그곳에서 뭘하는지를 알아오라고 한다. 잃어버린 시간의 폐허 보스방에 가면 돈히코테가 있다. 위습 자이언트를 물리치고 말을 걸면, 돈히코테는 자신이 정령들의 여왕을 구하러 왔다가 공격을 당했다고 한다. 그는 위습 자이언트를 정령들의 여왕이라고 믿고 있고, 그녀가 저주에 걸려서 이성을 잃었다고 단언하고 있다. 그는 새로운 계시를 받았다면서 로터스 마쉬로 떠나겠다고 한다. 칼라엔은 돈히코테의 이야기를 비웃다가, 유저가 그를 옹호하면 위습들이 정령들의 변형체일지도 모른다는 이야기를 한다.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
The Queen of spirits must be here somewhere.
I must save her.
(You have to get the quest from Court Sorceress Kayleen)

$self-Acclaimed Squire Chanso$
Don Xiqote, I have my eyes open wide too.
We will be able to find the Queen of spirits.
(You have to get the quest from Court Sorceress Kayleen)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He said he'll first search Ruins of Lost Time.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
You know that monster, some knight or something.
Where did he say he was going to find the Queen of spirits?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not sure. He didn't seem like he'd give up easily.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
Hoho, Ruins of Lost Time?
They're incorrigible.
They'll get a good lesson and give up.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
We'll know the results if we continue to observe it.
So? Do you want to bet if he'll give up?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
If I win, you run my errands for 3 months, and if you win, I'll give you this.
<html>$Foolishness and Creed$</html>

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I'm sure you know where Ruins of Lost Time is.
Hurry up.

$self-Acclaimed Squire Chanso$
Oh my, Don Xiqote!!
D-didn't you say that the Queen of spirits must be here?!!
(Chanso seems to shocked to talk)

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
Huh... Th-this... It can't be?!
(Don Xiqote seems very surprised)

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
I'm not hur.
B-but... Why did the spirits attack me, the knight who has received their queen's devine revelation....

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't tell me you think that fierce wisp is the queen?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
That's right. The Goddess told me in my dream last night that the Queen of Spirits was held captive here.

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
Fierce? What a ludicrous statement about the noble ladies?!
Can't you see?
That elegant dress that only the Queen of the spirits can wear?

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
The dress that sprinkles sparkling fairy's powder when she softly takes her steps...For its purity I'm awed and feel like kissing the tip of the dress....

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If that wisp really is a spirit then it shouldn't attack you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
Oh, with my blunt words, I can't even describe how beautiful it is.
(Don Xiqote seems to be thinking for sure that the wisp is the queen of spirits)

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
(Don Xiqote ponders for a while and claps like he understood something)
Oh, yes. I get it!
I understand the reason now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Don Xiqote closes his eyes like he's praying)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
Those spirits must have been cursed like those other spirits that I met last time! So the wise and kind Queen had lost her sanity!
Hmm, please wait for a while.

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
I got the new revelation from the Goddess! To break the curse of the Queen, we have to go to Lotus Marsh! The Goddess said that we'll find a way to turn the Queen back if we go there!

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
I will go to Lotus Marsh, guardian!
Thank you for all your help.

$self-Acclaimed Squire Chanso$
Don Xiqote!
Chanso will follow you to Lotus Marsh!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He seemed like he was attacked by water wisps.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Oh, you're back.
So what was that crazy knight-or-something doing?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He was trying to save the water wisp thinking that it was the Queen of Spirits.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
What? Hahaha!!
Did he think that the water wisp was a dragon? To kill that thing and act like a hero?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No. He went to Lotus Marsh saying that he got a new revelation.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
(Kayleen burst into laughter)
Hohoho, thought that the wisp was the queen?
Well, since he learnt a lesson, he wouldn't do this anymore.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He seems like he'll try to break the curse on the queen.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
What? He still hasn't learnt his lesson?
And what revelation?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He may be crazy, but I think well of his attitude of devoting himself towards his goal.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
He's so persistent.
Isn't it time to give up?
Why is he still not giving up?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Kayleen seems to be thinking of something)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
The devotion of a crazy man will go nowhere.
Did you become sick in the head too?
Hmm, but spirits and wisps....

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Well, The difference between madness and passion is paper-thin.
Maybe...that crazy knight is right.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
The period when wisps started to appear coincides with the period the spirits started to disappear. Nothing gets suddenly created or disappear.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't tell me you used the wisps as ingredients for your cosmetics?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Well, it's always a possibility.
(Kayleen talks to herself)
Was that the reason why the wisps were so moisturizing?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But you said that the wisps may be spirits. That's a little....</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Yeah, what about that?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Quiet! Why are you so stingy on such things.
Let's say the wisps really are spirits.
We don't even know how they can turn back into spirit.?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
So stop whining and take this and go.
Chey, I lost the bet in the end.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
You'll get old soon if you care about such trivial stuff.
You need to be like me to maintain your beauty.

journal.title: Talk to self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote
journal.contents:
Go to Ruins of Lost Time and look for Don Xiqote.

Hermalte Port(River Ruins) → Ruins of Lost Time
journal.destination: Talk to self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote

journal.title: Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.contents:
self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote seems to be leaving for Lotus Marsh. Tell this to Saint Haven's Court Sorceress Kayleen.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.todo_msg: Go back to Court Sorceress Kayleen at Saint Haven.
